001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.HashMap;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Map;
007import java.util.Objects;
008import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock;
009
010import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
011
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogFormatter;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.CaseChanging;
014import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.DefaultPatternRegistry.CustomConverterKey;
015import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternFormatterFactory.KeywordFactory;
016
017/**
018 * Pattern registry to register custom keywords.
019 */
020public sealed interface PatternRegistry {
021
022        /**
023         * Gets the formatter factory for the pattern key.
024         * @param key keyword.
025         * @return factory or null.
026         */
027        public @Nullable PatternFormatterFactory getOrNull(String key);
028
029        /**
030         * Registers a pattern key with a formatter factory. You may replace the built-in
031         * pattern formatters with {@link KeywordKey} or {@link ColorKey}s or create a new key
032         * with {@link PatternKey#of(String)}.
033         * @param key pattern keys.
034         * @param factory factory to create formatters from pattern keywords.
035         */
036        public void register(PatternKey key, PatternFormatterFactory factory);
037
038        /**
039         * Convenience function for {@link #register(PatternKey, PatternFormatterFactory)} as
040         * keyword factory is a lambda.
041         * @param key pattern keys.
042         * @param factory factory create formatter from a simple keyword.
043         */
044        default void keyword(PatternKey key, KeywordFactory factory) {
045                register(key, factory);
046        }
047
048        /**
049         * Creates a pattern registry with the defaults.
050         * @return default registry.
051         */
052        public static PatternRegistry of() {
053                return DefaultPatternRegistry.registerDefaults(new DefaultPatternRegistry());
054        }
055
056        /**
057         * Pattern keywords.
058         *
059         * @see KeywordKey
060         * @see ColorKey
061         */
062        public sealed interface PatternKey {
063
064                /**
065                 * Keyword names.
066                 * @return keywords should not be empty.
067                 */
068                List<String> aliases();
069
070                /**
071                 * Creates a pattern key of one key name.
072                 * @param key key name.
073                 * @return pattern key.
074                 */
075                public static PatternKey of(String key) {
076                        return new CustomConverterKey(List.of(key));
077                }
078
079                /**
080                 * Creates a pattern key of one key and aliases.
081                 * @param key key name.
082                 * @param aliases other names.
083                 * @return pattern key.
084                 */
085                public static PatternKey of(String key, String... aliases) {
086                        List<String> keys = new ArrayList<>();
087                        keys.add(Objects.requireNonNull(key));
088                        for (var a : aliases) {
089                                keys.add(Objects.requireNonNull(a));
090                        }
091                        return new CustomConverterKey(List.copyOf(keys));
092                }
093
094        }
095
096        /**
097         * Built-in supported pattern keys.
098         */
099        @CaseChanging
100        enum KeywordKey implements PatternKey {
101
102                /**
103                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#date">Date keywords</a>
104                 */
105                DATE("d", "date"), //
106                /**
107                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#micros">Micros keywords</a>
108                 */
109                MICROS("ms", "micros"), //
110                /**
111                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#file">File</a>
112                 */
113                FILE("f", "file"),
114                /**
115                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#line">Line no</a>
116                 */
117                LINE("L", "line"),
118                /**
119                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#class">Calling class</a>
120                 */
121                CLASS("C", "class"),
122                /**
123                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#line">Line no</a>
124                 */
125                METHOD("M", "method"),
126                /**
127                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#relative">Thread
128                 * keywords</a>
129                 */
130                THREAD("t", "thread"), //
131                /**
132                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#level">Level keywords</a>
133                 */
134                LEVEL("level", "le", "p"), //
135                /**
136                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#logger">Logger keywords</a>
137                 */
138                LOGGER("lo", "logger", "c"), //
139                /**
140                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#message">Message
141                 * keywords</a>
142                 */
143                MESSAGE("m", "msg", "message"), //
144                /**
145                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#mdc">MDC keywords</a>
146                 */
147                MDC("X", "mdc"), //
148                /**
149                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#ex">Throwable keywords</a>
150                 */
151                THROWABLE("ex", "exception", "throwable"), //
152                /**
153                 * <a href="https://logback.qos.ch/manual/layouts.html#newline">Newline
154                 * keywords</a>
155                 */
156                LINESEP("n");
157
158                private final List<String> aliases;
159
160                private KeywordKey(List<String> aliases) {
161                        this.aliases = aliases;
162                }
163
164                private KeywordKey(String... others) {
165                        this(List.of(others));
166                }
167
168                public List<String> aliases() {
169                        return this.aliases;
170                }
171
172        }
173
174        /**
175         * Built-in supported color pattern keys.
176         */
177        @CaseChanging
178        enum ColorKey implements PatternKey {
179
180                /**
181                 * ANSI black color
182                 */
183                BLACK("black"), //
184                /**
185                 * ANSI red color
186                 */
187                RED("red"), //
188                /**
189                 * ANSI green color
190                 */
191                GREEN("green"), //
192                /**
193                 * ANSI yellow color
194                 */
195                YELLOW("yellow"), //
196                /**
197                 * ANSI blue color
198                 */
199                BLUE("blue"), //
200                /**
201                 * ANSI magenta color
202                 */
203                MAGENTA("magenta"), //
204                /**
205                 * ANSI cyan color
206                 */
207                CYAN("cyan"), //
208                /**
209                 * ANSI white color
210                 */
211                WHITE("white"), //
212                /**
213                 * ANSI gray color
214                 */
215                GRAY("gray"), //
216                /**
217                 * ANSI boldRed color
218                 */
219                BOLD_RED("boldRed"), //
220                /**
221                 * ANSI boldGreen color
222                 */
223                BOLD_GREEN("boldGreen"), //
224                /**
225                 * ANSI boldYellow color
226                 */
227                BOLD_YELLOW("boldYellow"), //
228                /**
229                 * ANSI boldBlue color
230                 */
231                BOLD_BLUE("boldBlue"), //
232                /**
233                 * ANSI boldMagenta color
234                 */
235                BOLD_MAGENTA("boldMagenta"), //
236                /**
237                 * ANSI boldCyan color
238                 */
239                BOLD_CYAN("boldCyan"), //
240                /**
241                 * ANSI boldWhite color
242                 */
243                BOLD_WHITE("boldWhite"), //
244                /**
245                 * A special color composite key that will highlight based on logger level.
246                 */
247                HIGHLIGHT("highlight"), //
248                ;
249
250                private final List<String> aliases;
251
252                private ColorKey(List<String> aliases) {
253                        this.aliases = aliases;
254                }
255
256                private ColorKey(String... others) {
257                        this(List.of(others));
258                }
259
260                public List<String> aliases() {
261                        return this.aliases;
262                }
263
264        }
265
266}
267
268final class DefaultPatternRegistry implements PatternRegistry {
269
270        private final Map<String, PatternKey> keys = new HashMap<>();
271
272        private final Map<PatternKey, PatternFormatterFactory> converters = new HashMap<>();
273
274        private final ReentrantReadWriteLock lock = new ReentrantReadWriteLock();
275
276        public DefaultPatternRegistry() {
277                super();
278        }
279
280        public void register(PatternKey key, PatternFormatterFactory factory) {
281                lock.writeLock().lock();
282                try {
283                        var f = converters.get(key);
284                        if (f == null) {
285                                for (var a : key.aliases()) {
286                                        if (keys.containsKey(a)) {
287                                                throw new IllegalArgumentException("Key already registered: " + a);
288                                        }
289                                        keys.put(a, key);
290                                }
291                        }
292                        converters.put(key, factory);
293                }
294                finally {
295                        lock.writeLock().unlock();
296                }
297        }
298
299        public @Nullable PatternFormatterFactory getOrNull(String key) {
300                lock.readLock().lock();
301                try {
302                        var ck = keys.get(key);
303                        if (ck == null)
304                                return null;
305                        return converters.get(ck);
306                }
307                finally {
308                        lock.readLock().unlock();
309                }
310        }
311
312        static PatternRegistry registerDefaults(PatternRegistry registry) {
313                for (KeywordKey c : KeywordKey.values()) {
314                        KeywordFactory keyword = switch (c) {
315                                case MESSAGE -> KeywordFactory.of(LogFormatter.builder().message().build());
316                                case DATE -> StandardKeywordFactory.DATE;
317                                case LEVEL -> KeywordFactory.of(LogFormatter.LevelFormatter.of());
318                                case LINESEP -> (fc, n) -> new LogFormatter.StaticFormatter(fc.lineSeparator());
319                                case LOGGER -> StandardKeywordFactory.LOGGER;
320                                case MDC -> StandardKeywordFactory.MDC;
321                                case MICROS -> KeywordFactory.of(LogFormatter.TimestampFormatter.ofMicros());
322                                case THREAD -> KeywordFactory.of(LogFormatter.builder().threadName().build());
323                                case THROWABLE -> KeywordFactory.of(LogFormatter.ThrowableFormatter.of());
324                                case CLASS -> KeywordFactory.of(CallerInfoFormatter.CLASS);
325                                case FILE -> KeywordFactory.of(CallerInfoFormatter.FILE);
326                                case LINE -> KeywordFactory.of(CallerInfoFormatter.LINE);
327                                case METHOD -> KeywordFactory.of(CallerInfoFormatter.METHOD);
328                                default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unexpected value: " + c);
329                        };
330
331                        registry.register(c, keyword);
332                }
333
334                for (ColorKey c : ColorKey.values()) {
335                        var factory = switch (c) {
336                                case RED -> ColorCompositeFactory.RED;
337                                case BLACK -> ColorCompositeFactory.BLACK;
338                                case BLUE -> ColorCompositeFactory.BLUE;
339                                case CYAN -> ColorCompositeFactory.CYAN;
340                                case GRAY -> ColorCompositeFactory.GRAY;
341                                case GREEN -> ColorCompositeFactory.GREEN;
342                                case MAGENTA -> ColorCompositeFactory.MAGENTA;
343                                case WHITE -> ColorCompositeFactory.WHITE;
344                                case YELLOW -> ColorCompositeFactory.YELLOW;
345                                case BOLD_BLUE -> ColorCompositeFactory.BOLD_BLUE;
346                                case BOLD_CYAN -> ColorCompositeFactory.BOLD_CYAN;
347                                case BOLD_GREEN -> ColorCompositeFactory.BOLD_GREEN;
348                                case BOLD_MAGENTA -> ColorCompositeFactory.BOLD_MAGENTA;
349                                case BOLD_RED -> ColorCompositeFactory.BOLD_RED;
350                                case BOLD_WHITE -> ColorCompositeFactory.BOLD_WHITE;
351                                case BOLD_YELLOW -> ColorCompositeFactory.BOLD_YELLOW;
352                                case HIGHLIGHT -> HightlightCompositeFactory.HIGHTLIGHT;
353                        };
354                        registry.register(c, factory);
355                }
356
357                registry.register(BareKey.BARE, BareCompositeFactory.BARE);
358                return registry;
359        }
360
361        record CustomConverterKey(List<String> aliases) implements PatternKey {
362
363        }
364
365        enum BareKey implements PatternKey {
366
367                BARE() {
368                        @Override
369                        public List<String> aliases() {
370                                return List.of("BARE");
371                        }
372
373                }
374
375        }
376
